trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>Inntreffer like før et skjema er lukket, enten av brukeren, via brukergrensesnittet (UI), eller programmatisk kall til metoder for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klassen, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et skjema har ingen underordnede eller eies skjemaer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>denne hendelsen oppstår også for hver.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If any one of the forms cancels the event, none of the forms are closed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en av skjemaene avbryter hendelsen, er ingen av skjemaene lukket.

trans-unit.source: Therefore the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are not sent to any of the forms.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>hendelser sendes ikke til noen av skjemaene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosingEventArgs class provides data for this event.
trans-unit.target: Klassen FormClosingEventArgs inneholder data for denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Two important members are the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Det er to viktige medlemmer av <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to true.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen kan avbrytes ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen til sann.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides a reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>egenskapen gir en årsak hvorfor skjemaet lukkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` and `cancel` parameters are used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den `closeReason` og `cancel` parameterne brukes til å initialisere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> verdi som Representer årsak hvorfor skjemaet lukkes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å avbryte hendelsen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir hvorfor skjemaet lukkes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>kan bli lukket på grunn av en rekke grunner både Brukerstartet og programmatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The CloseReason property indicates a reason for the closure.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CloseReason angir en årsak for avslutning.
Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> listes opp verdier.
